thread.title: Baltimore Police Seize Loaded Shotgun & Drugs During Investigation
thread.title_full: Baltimore Police Seize Loaded Shotgun & Drugs During Investigation

title: Baltimore Police Seize Loaded Shotgun & Drugs During Investigation
text:
Baltimore Police Seize Loaded Shotgun & Drugs During Investigation « CBS Baltimore 
WJZ at Orioles Spring Training: Mark Viviano reports live tonight from Florida 
February 16, 2017 8:31 PM 
BALTIMORE (WJZ)– City Police recovered a loaded shotgun, marijuana, heroin and money Thursday in a southwest Baltimore home. 
Detectives were investigating recent violence in the area and served a warrant in the 600 block of Wicklow Road, where they found the items. 
41-year old Jarrod McFadden was arrested at the scene. McFadden was transported to the Central Booking and Intake Facility.
